items.sentence: OK, I'll pretend that we're equals, but you know that we aren't.
Let's pretend that I don't know anything. Now, explain it to me.
When I got home, I crawled into bed and immediately fell asleep.
Tom says that he almost always has three hundred dollars on him.
Or are there photographs so obscene that you can't publish them?
Tom said that he didn't care who did it, as long as it got done.
I'd like to sell three of my guitars. Would you like to buy one?
Tom drove for several hours and then pulled over and took a nap.
Tom worked in a convenience store when he was a college student.
Tom has started hanging out with some of the bad kids at school.
